Institution: SCFMS - STATE COLLEGE OF FLORIDA, MANATEE-SARASOTA
Course Description: THIS COURSE IS DESIGNED TO MEET THE SPECIAL NEEDS OF INDIVIDUALS OR GROUPS FOR WHOM REGULARLY DESCRIBED COURSES IN ACCOUNTING MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE.  (OFFERED ONLY AS NEEDED)
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major: SPECIFIC STUDENT PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES ARE DEVELOPED FOR EACH STUDENT, WHICH ARE IN LINE WITH THEIR CAREER GOALS AND THE LENGTH AND TYPE OF WORK INTERNSHIP AVAILABLE.
